Given the high probability of acceptance and the need to secure a match before the market closes, I will formally apply to School_D.

conversation.message: Student_B, we are exceptionally pleased to receive your formal application. We have been highly impressed by your profile and believe your dedication to academic rigor aligns perfectly with the values of School_D. Given your outstanding qualifications and our limited remaining position, we are delighted to offer you a match immediately. We look forward to welcoming you to our community.
conversation.thought: I am School_D, and Student_B is my absolute highest priority (#1) on my True Priority List: ['Student_B', 'Student_D', 'Student_E', 'Student_C', 'Student_A']. I have a remaining quota of 1 and have not matched anyone yet. Since Student_B has applied ([APPLY]), I must secure this match immediately to maximize my outcome, regardless of Student_B's low preference rank for me (D is 4th choice for B).
